overview: Rocco Siffredi returns as the ageless, lust-driven vampire Drax. Surrounded by a bevy of beautiful willing victims, he seeks out and seduces the stunning Christina Angel who joins him in his world of never-ending sin ... together they embark on a rampage of sexual excess captivating, controlling and enslaving all those who fall under the sexual spell of the vampire.
title: Intercourse with the Vampire 2
